title: Sixteen days in September
brief_description: The September 2000 Olympic Games held in Sydney, Australia has been hailed as the Games that restored people’s faith in the Olympic movement. With a global participation of 11,000 athletes from 200 nations, this commemorative program captures all the greatest achievements and performances of Australia’s most successful Olympic team ever and shows all of their medal-winning performances, whether Gold, Silver or Bronze.
